review:
I'm extremely happy to share my experience with Dr. D. Srikanth Reddy.  We have been taking our kid since childhood. He is a wonderful Doctor and He is so patient enough to listen the problems. His treatment is precise, directed to the cause and always tries to avoid antibiotics. He is flexible and was available on a phone call or WhatsApp in emergency.

Dr. D. Srikanth Reddy is very kind and approachable, took good care of our child, I strongly recommend him.
reply_text:
Thanks a lot for your kind words
Regards
